data.prayer: Spirit, please equip every disciple to make disciples who make disciples in the state of Lubelskie.
data.verse: And the things you have heard me say in the presence of many witnesses entrust to reliable people who will also be qualified to teach others.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Lubelskie, Poland
data.section_summary: What challenges do people here face?

data.prayer: Lord, teach the disciples in the state of Lubelskie to trust your Word, like a lamp, in the darkness around them.
data.verse: your Word is a lamp for my feet, a light on my path.

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 322 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Father, your Word is essential for life and growth. Please challenge the 1,923,854 cultural Christians in the state of Lubelskie to read your Word for themselves today.
data.verse: It is written: 'Man shall not live by bread alone, but by every word that comes from the mouth of God.'

data.prayer: Spirit, teach the 6,694 believers in the state of Lubelskie the wisdom of how to form simple, reproducible churches of 12-30 in every neighborhood.
Father, 0.0% are known to be believers. Please, Lord call more today.
Oh Lord, show the fatherless in the state of Lubelskie that you can be their real Father.
data.verse: I will be to you a Father. you will be to me sons and daughters,’ says the Lord Almighty.

data.prayer: There are 2,157,200 people living in the state of Lubelskie. Only about 6,694 might be believers.
Spirit, inspire new kinds of evangelism through social media in Lubelskie, Poland.
data.verse: But you, keep your head in all situations, endure hardship, do the work of an evangelist, discharge all the duties of your ministry.
